rabbit.html
Class HtmlParser

java.lang.Object
  rabbit.html.HtmlParser

public class HtmlParser
extends Object

This is a class that is used to parse a block of HTML code into separate tokens. This parser uses a recursive descent approach.

Author:
Robert Olofsson
